title: This video shows the terrible situation at a hospital in Mumbai (KEM hospital), not Delhi
subtitle: The video shared as 'terrible situation in a hospital in Delhi' is not related to any hospital in Delhi. The video was taken at the KEM hospital in Mumbai.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A video is being shared widely on social media with a claim that it shows the terrible situation inside a hospital in Delhi. The Chief Minister of Delhi is being blamed for such conditions in the hospital. Let’s fact-check the claim made in the post.

Claim: Video shows the terrible situation in a hospital in Delhi. Fact: The video is not related to any hospital in Delhi. The video was taken at the KEM hospital in Mumbai. Hence the claim made in the post is FALSE.

In the comment section of the post, a user has commented that the video is related to the KEM hospital in Mumbai. Also, in the video at 10 secs, the man can be heard telling that it is KEM hospital, and at 1 min 22 secs, the lady asks the person to go out and upload the video on Facebook by tagging the KEM hospital. When searched with the keywords, it was found that Ram Kadan, an MLA and BJP leader in Maharashtra, has also posted the same video on 27 May 2020 with a description that the video was taken at Mumbai’s KEM hospital on Tuesday.

Also, various media reports referring the video to be related to KEM hospital can be found on the internet. They can be read here and here. While there are some media reports about the horrifying visuals from a mortuary in Delhi, the posted video is not related to Delhi. Also, the Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) has tweeted that the video is not from Delhi.

To sum it up, this video shows the terrible situation at a hospital in Mumbai (KEM hospital), not Delhi.

Did you watch our new video?
